name: infinifractal
description: A multithreaded Mandlebrot set fractal generator written in C++ and SDL.

name: UBC Workday Calendar by Term
description: A Chrome extension written in JavaScript that allows users to filter their courses in the calendar by term.

name: WestPeak Research Website
description: A website for WestPeak Research Association written in TypeScript, React and Gatsby, displaying published research reports done by members and information about the club.

name: EncryptDecrypt
description: An iOS app written in Swift that teaches users the concept of encryption, particularly the Diffie-Hellman key exchange algorithm, through an interactive interface.
